title: Please help me with my NY Giants team set
author: Maxjacks

posts.post_title: Please help me with my NY Giants team set
posts.post_content:
I have 51 of the 52 cards 

I just need the Mathewson White Cap! Looking for it in an SGC 30 or 20 with nice eye appeal. 

Other than the White cap  I'm looking to upgrade the following cards in SGC 40-50 holders 

Larry Doyle Throwing

Chief Myers Batting

Cy Seymour portrait

Fred Snodgrass Batting

Hooks Wiltse With Cap

Thanks for Looking! Hopefully we can work out a few deals!  Feel free to PM me or email me at [url]maxjacks89@yahoo.com[/url]
Up again! I would love to finally finish this one off
